ques: As a creative,will I get paid when my recipe is downloaded multiple times?
ans: Yes, you will get paid when the recipe you created reaches about 100 downloads.

ques: Do I need to sign up  before I can download recipes from the app?
ans: Yes, signing up does not only help you to easily download recipes but it can help you track and keep records of all the recipes you have liked and downloaded, very easy to come back to in future.

ques: Is the access to this app subscription based?
ans: Yes and no, to access premium content recipes you need to subscribe to the app with the plan that is most convenient for you but there are contents you can access without subscription.

ques: What are the durations of the subscription plan?
ans: Yes, we have different packages and durations of subscription, please check the link below to choose the one that is best for your budget.

ques: How do you sign up as a creator?
ans: Yes,you can sign up as a creator by clicking on the creative user option during sign up.

ques: Can the recipe be downloaded with any color of my choice?
ans: Yes,it can be downloaded with the original color and other colors.
